lexUnit.name: surprising.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing feelings of surprise and astonishment

sentence.text: Nowadays , nobility is on the side of those who used to be called Redmen , hardly surprising to anyone who has read any of the dreadful history of the spread of Europeans across the West .
Such strength in depth makes it hardly surprising that England A struggled in their recent ` Test " series over there .

I 've had rather a surprising piece of news , that 's all . "

It is grown on the slopes of the Himalayas in Pakistan and has very thin grains and a surprising fragrance .
Even those of which we have evidence are very daunting creatures -- and the most surprising descendants to have sprung from the simple little shells that first appeared 600 million years ago .

It 's sad but not surprising

When researchers look at schooling from the point of view of girls , it is perhaps not surprising that writers as diverse as Alison Kelly and Valerie Walkerdine can come up with very similar findings .

It is not surprising , therefore , to find multiple deprivation among benefit recipients-deprivation in terms of health , education , housing , diet , clothing and participation in community activities .
It 's highly surprising !

A pond encourages a surprising amount of wildlife .
Focused effort and determination can yield a surprising amount of information but the motivation has to he high .
For a horse who has a fairly relaxed outlook on life , Milton has a surprising number of phobias .

As long as you consult the professionals , a surprising number of walls can be taken down with ease and the resulting increase in light and space is clearly amazing .
This interesting and surprising result awaits replication .

The only surprising thing about the Life was the scale of its failure .
Surprising things happen . "

IT 'S not surprising that the miners have chosen camouflage as their symbol of solidarity .
Since all body cells contain the same genes , it might seem surprising that all body cells are n't the same as each other .
It seems surprising that the gravitational force should dominate in the Universe .
At first it may seem surprising to find a Gentile so involved in Jewish affairs but it was not all that unusual .

If we look at the history of the world , it seems surprising that love is included .

The word gigantic may seem surprising for a cell , especially when you remember that 10 million bacterial cells could sit on the surface of a pin 's head .
The tall Finnish detective acted with a turn of speed altogether surprising to Miss Buckley .

Such a disrespectful term might seem surprising in this essentially respectful essay .

The endowment of her darling girl had meant a surprising depletion in her income .

Given that there are so few women in powerful positions this may seem surprising .
